export var reducer=function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:stateChunk;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"CRITERIA":{return _objectSpread({},state,{},action.criteria);}// Action to handle the completion of a search, updating the photos array.

default:return state;}};// Connecting the RoverSearch component to the Redux store.
var ConnectedRoverSearch=connect(// Mapping the Redux state to the component's props.
